title: Private Equity Faces Uncertainty After Record-Setting Year, Report Says
sub_head: The industry faces new geopolitical and interest-rate risks after shattering fundraising and investment records last year, Bain & Co. says
body:
Private-equity managers are continuing to invest at a record pace while attempting to manage uncertainty around interest rates, inflation and global geopolitics, a report from consulting firm Bain & Co. said.
In buyout deals, exits and fundraising, the industry set records last year, according to the report, released Monday by the Boston-based...
